abstract: In the trial of Terra Firma’s lawsuit against Citigroup, Terra Firma founder Guy Hands was forced on the witness stand to relive the buyout of EMI.
snippet: In the trial of Terra Firma’s lawsuit against Citigroup, Terra Firma founder Guy Hands was forced on the witness stand to relive the buyout of EMI.
lead_paragraph: When Guy Hands acquired the music company EMI Group more than three years ago, the New York City venue he most likely envisioned himself in was Madison Square Garden, taking in a Coldplay concert in the front row or perhaps a Lady Antebellum show from a sky box.

headline.main: Hands on the Stand: Replaying the EMI Deal
